channel.title: ChIP-Seq on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in ChIP-Seq on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Foundations of Genomic Data – Post 13: SummarizedExperiment
item.description: Discover how SummarizedExperiment serves as the culminating container of the Bioconductor ecosystem, elegantly combining GRanges, DataFrame, and assay matrices into a unified object that ensures synchronized, reproducible genomic analyses across diverse experimental types.

item.title: Foundations of Genomic Data – Post 7: GenomicAlignments
item.description: Explore the power of GenomicAlignments for working with sequence alignment data in R. Learn to import BAM/SAM files, extract biological insights, and integrate with the broader Bioconductor ecosystem.
